Posts.Content: Hi I wonder if anyone can help,  I have stage 2 Breast cancer I had a lumpectomy and sentinel node biopsy on Monday , I’m still very sore as expected but I have really bad back pain only on the left side the side of the surgery. Is this normal?  Shexxx
Posts.Title: Back pain after Breast lumpectomy

Posts.Content: Thank you granny59 for replying I was thinking the same if still the same on Monday will contact the Breast care nurse  shexxx
Posts.Title: Back pain after Breast lumpectomy
